data.title: Flying
data.text:
Commercial Airports in the Region

Newark Liberty International Airport

Newark International Airport is New Jerseyâ€™s aviation hub, offering a full range of domestic and international flights. From Morris County, take NJ Transit rail and transfer at Secaucus Junction to the Northeast Corridor or the North Jersey Coast Line to reach the airport. At the airport station, board the AirTrain to reach your terminal.*

www.newarkairport.com | 973-961-6000

John F. Kennedy International Airport

JFK International Airport is located in southern Queens, New York, providing domestic and international flights. From NY Penn Station, take the LIRR to the Jamaica Station and board the AirTrain to reach your terminal.*

www.jfkairport.com | 718-244-4444

LaGuardia International Airport

LaGuardia Airport is located in northern Queens, New York, primarily providing domestic flights.*

laguardiaairport.com | 718-533-3400

* Please visit the airport website for additional transportation options to travel to and from the airport.

Airports in Morris County

Morristown Municipal Airport

Morristown Municipal Airport is located in Hanover Township and is used as a private airport for corporate and personal aircraft.

mmuair.com | 973-538-6400

Lincoln Park Airport

Lincoln Park Airport is located in Lincoln Park Borough and is a privately owned airport with a flight school.

973-628-7166
